name: Nomadyk
description:
In Nomadyk, you have run out of money to pay for the rest of your trip to Khargis. Luckily, a tribe of nomads that was passing by offered you a hike to your destination. However, in exchange, you'll need to help them out by sorting their supplies on each stop on the way!

Game made by Mateus Carmo (@carmo_no_sadame) and Pedro Braz (@pedrobrazleite) for Godot Wild Jam 29.
